basics.name: Manuel Lostaló
basics.label: Software Engineering Student & Web Developer
basics.summary: Software engineering student passionate about technology and the creation of innovative solutions. With experience in multiple programming languages and technologies, I specialize in developing unique web applications with a strong focus on design and user experience.

education.summary: Graduated with honors. Won the class gold medal for academic excellence and participated in the Argentine Mathematical Olympiad (OMA), reaching the national stage.

work.summary: Developed communication and customer service skills by interacting daily with guests from different cultures. Improved my English proficiency while coordinating recreational activities in an English-speaking environment.
Designed and implemented dynamic lesson plans to prepare students for the Argentine Mathematical Olympiad (OMA), fostering critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

projects.name: ScholarSync
projects.description: A collaborative web app developed for a university course. It allows high school and college students to ask and answer questions, rewarding helpfulness and promoting peer learning.
highlights: Built with Spring, Java, ReactJS, Docker, PostgreSQL
